About Me

I was born and raised in Hong Kong. Growing up, I dreamed of becoming many things. However, none stood out to me as much as computer science and finance. I am fascinated by how these fields intersect and drive innovation, and I aspire to contribute to that.

To achieve my goals, I aim to make the most of my university years by pursuing both disciplines. I believe that with dedication and hard work, I can make a meaningful impact on the world.

“People should pursue what they’re passionate about. That will make them happier than pretty much anything else.”

For fun, here is my EDC (Everyday Carry)

  • MacBook Pro 14" (M1)
  • iPad Pro 11" (M2)
  • iPhone 12 Pro
  • AirPods Pro (2nd generation)
